mapper.insert: insert into MilkContainerInfo (mcId, CompanyId, mcNo, mcName, mcPosition, temperature, weight, updateDate, createDate, attrbute1, attrbute2, attrbute3, attrbute4, attrbute5) values (#{mcid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{companyid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mcno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mcname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mcposition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{temperature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{attrbute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attrbute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attrbute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attrbute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attrbute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.select: select mcId, CompanyId, mcNo, mcName, mcPosition, temperature, weight, updateDate, createDate, attrbute1, attrbute2, attrbute3, attrbute4, attrbute5 from MilkContainerInfo
